form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cotton introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To terminate the exemption from numerical limitations for H–1B nonimmigrants employed by institutions of higher education.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Colleges for the American People Act of 2025 or the CAP Act of 2025.

section.header: Termination of exemption from numerical limitations for H–1B nonimmigrants employed by institutions of higher education
section.text: Section 214(g)(5) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1184(g)(5)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (B) and (C) as subparagraphs (A) and (B), respectively.
